airhockeyjava.util

Class Geometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • airhockeyjava.util.Geometry

  • public class Geometry
extends java.lang.Object
    A set of utility to compute intersection of line segments, creating arrows etc.
    Author:
    Pinaki Poddar

      • getRectilinearPath

        public static java.awt.geom.Path2D getRectilinearPath(java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D r1,
                                                      java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D r2)
        Get a path between the centers of two given rectangles. The path has two orthogonal line segments. The first segment is horizontal (vertical) if the horizontal displacement between the centers is longer (shorter) than the vertical.

        public static java.awt.geom.Point2D vertex(int i,
                                           java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D r)
        Gets the i-th vertex of the given rectangle. 0-th vertex is top-left, and counted couter-clockwise i.e bottom-left is at index 3.
